message.raw: update per pull request comments.  Due to race condition, ros model/sensor plugins are not loaded if ros::init hasn't been called via system plugin gazebo_ros_api plugin.cpp.  Fixed a typo in one of the launch files (drc_robot_no_controller.launch refers to old model.sdf).
